title: Police constable beaten to death in Tangalle
content: A police constable was beaten to death in Vitharandeniya, Tangalle. Police Spokesperson Attorney-at-Law SSP Nihal Thalduwa speaking to News 1st said the police constable was attacked by a group from an ongoing hotel construction site close to his residence on Thursday (17) night. In addition, the Police Constableâ€™s wife and another person were also beaten. Sri Lanka Police said further investigations are underway.
